titles.title: A bill for the relief of Nolan Sharp.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to a named individual a sum to be determined in full settlement of his claims for retroactive service-connected disability payments for multiple sclerosis. Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to determine the amount of such payment.
